entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
